author: Niisha
text:
Not to get stuck in life for so long,
Everything needs change after sometime.
Having faith in God that whatever happens it's because of our good in some way or other.
May be we will not realize it now but definitely later on at some point of time.
It's never late to take action.

author: Niisha
text:
When we can feel someone from far away,
When someone never leave your thoughts and will go with you wherever you are and at any place in your life,
that's called true feelings.

author: Niisha
text:
Love and understanding should be there both.
If anyone is missing it will not be good.
Even if there are clashes on various issues, accepting them respectfully and with love will work.
No need to change the other person completely according to you.
Just respect the differences.

author: Niisha
text:
Between ego and love.
Love should win always.

author: Niisha
text:
Being silent doesn't mean you have nothing to say,
It's just that no one will understand what you are trying to say it's better to remain in silence then.

author: Niisha
text: Standing for your own will never be wrong.
